original_text: The Lord your God became angry with me, because of you. He told me very strongly that I would not go across the Jordan River. He said that I would not go into the good land that he is now giving to you.
korean_text: 여호와께서 너희로 말미암아 내게 진노하사 내게 요단을 건너지 못하며 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 기업으로 주신 그 아름다운 땅에 들어가지 못하게 하리라고 맹세하셨은즉

sentences.original_text: The Lord your God became angry with me
that I would not go across the Jordan River
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 요단 강을 건너지 못할 것이라고

sentences.original_text: He said that I would not go into the good land
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 내가 그 좋은 땅에 들어가지 못할 것이라고 말하셨다

sentences.original_text: that he is now giving to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 지금 너희에게 주고 있는 땅이라고
